modName: Revealing steel plate armor for men
summary: Stand-alone, for Sundracon and FavoredSoul body
descriptionHtml:
All the holes necessary for your vital appendages.

Contains both Sundracon (pictured) and FavoredSoul versions. Make your preferred set at the forge!

For a replacer, simply remove the _fs_ or _sun_ part of the .nif files.

Requires: either Sundracon OR FavoredSoul mod by chris57.
author: Seedye

files.name: Revealing steel plate armor for Sundracon and FavoredSoul
